fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scry on a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you Scry on a player, you will find out who visited them, who they visited, and what their role is.
- A player will know when they're being watched.
- Scrying is Astral.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
